name: "Steve Jobs" circa 1999
description: Steven Paul Jobs (February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011) was an influential figure during the personal computer revolution of the 70s and 80s. Jobs co-founded Apple in 1976 with Steve Wozniak and later became the company's CEO in 1997. Prior to Apple, Jobs traveled to India in search of spiritual enlightenment. While there, jobs experimented with psychedelics and called his experiences, "one of the two or three most important things [he had] done in [his] life".
